docs.snippet: Bolivia and Paraguay early today initialed an agreement to submit to arbitration their 100-year-old quarrel over the Gran Chaco.
docs.lead_paragraph: Bolivia and Paraguay early today initialed an agreement to submit to arbitration their 100-year-old quarrel over the Gran Chaco.
docs.abstract: credited with Paraguay's agreement to arbitrate

headline.main: Bolivia and Paraguay to Arbitrate; Chaco Disputants' Initial Accord; Early Morning Agreement Bears Out Hopes of Neutrals for Peaceful Settlement of the Entire Issue Negotiations Near Peace OLD CHACO DISPUTE TO BE ARBITRATED Hull Sees Step Toward Peace

docs.snippet: The American proposal that the intergovernmental refugee committee should covert itself into a permanent body operating independently of the- League of Nations though in cooperation with it now seems for all practical purposes to have cleared its...
docs.lead_paragraph: The American proposal that the intergovernmental refugee committee should covert itself into a permanent body operating independently of the- League of Nations though in cooperation with it now seems for all practical purposes to have cleared its first hurdle. The British and trench delegations, it is understood, accept this much informally in principle.
docs.abstract: Brit and French agree in principle to permanent body outside League; Sir N Malcolm favors proposed body; Govt statements; U S will not change quota; Roosevelt message

headline.main: U. S. REFUGEE PLAN NEARER APPROVAL; British and French Agree in Principle to a Permanent Body Outside the League The British Attitude U. S. REFUGEE PLAN NEARER APPROYAL Got Discouraging Replies U. S. Cool to Quota Change The Government Statements Prague Watching Closely Exceptions Made Later

docs.snippet: The Chaco peace conference hopes that a treaty of peace and friendship defining the frontiers between Bolivia and Paraguay can be signed here this week as a result of the initialing of the draft agreement by the Foreign Ministers of the two countries...
docs.lead_paragraph: The Chaco peace conference hopes that a treaty of peace and friendship defining the frontiers between Bolivia and Paraguay can be signed here this week as a result of the initialing of the draft agreement by the Foreign Ministers of the two countries yesterday.

headline.main: CHACO DELEGATES WOULD SPEED PACT; Hope to Have Treaty Signed by Two Nations This Week and Ratified in 20 Days NEITHER SIDE SATISFIED Both Bolivia and Paraguay Say Draft Accord They Initialed Does Not Meet Objections Insist Bolivia Will Get Port Chile Praises Agreement
